items.name: Pulp Fiction
items.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

items.name: Fight Club
items.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

items.name: The Lord of the Rings
items.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
